thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 02 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bandwidth Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.30

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bandwidth Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.30
text:
Bandwidth Inc:
* BANDWIDTH ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33
* Q1 REVENUE $53 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $47.2 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.09 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 TOTAL REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $45.1 MILLION TO $45.6 MILLION
* SEES Q2 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $0.11 TO $0.14 PER SHARE
* SEES Q2 CPAAS REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $38.5 MILLION TO $39.0 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 CPAAS REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $159.0 MILLION TO $160.5 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 TOTAL REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $193.1 MILLION TO $194.6 MILLION
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 NON-GAAP EPS IS EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF APPROXIMATELY BREAK-EVEN TO A LOSS OF $0.11 PER SHARE
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $46.3 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.06, REVENUE VIEW $189.2 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
